oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: The !käin (formerly a man of the early race, and now a little bird which is said to resemble the Lanius collaris), the Ostrich, and the Lizard. By /han≠kass’o (L VIII.
8670). The !kain snatches the Ostrich's (the toi) head
hair, because he is vain and covets it (the Ostriches are also people of the Early Race). The !khau snatches the hair and pulls it over his own head.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The !kain who snatched off the hair of the Ostrich's head, and put it on his own head
